meanings.definition: Marked with a cancellation before use.
meanings.sent1: The precanceled stamp saved time at the post office.
meanings.sent2: The precanceled ticket allowed quick entry to the event.
meanings.sent3: The precanceled envelope made mailing letters easier.
meanings.sent4: The precanceled passport ensured smooth travels.
meanings.sent5: The precanceled coupon made shopping more convenient.

meanings.sent1: She precanceled her subscription before the renewal date.
meanings.sent2: The airline precanceled the flight due to bad weather.
meanings.sent3: He precanceled his appointment to avoid the rush.
meanings.sent4: The event planner precanceled the outdoor party to prevent any issues.
meanings.sent5: They precanceled the order to make changes before shipping.
